Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound #96 buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/ Michigan
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Michigan, 114th, State and 115th, due to police activity near 115th/ Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Michigan, 114th, State and 115th, due to police activity near 115th/ Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
